message: My daughter is 25. This girl was barely out of college. Some mothers best friend. A fathers everlasting joy. This would kill me. I can only imagine her parents suffering. I am so sorry for their grief and loss. May they both R.I.P.

Katie, I am on a long car ride and I just read some people's ignorant comments. Try not to take them personally. I have a horrible chronic physical illness and sometimes to help me through it I just read the comments on news feed and laugh. I think to myself how the hell can some people be so ignorant and judgemental? Lol. Sometimes I will comment, just to try to educate

Do you have State Farm insurance, if you have the towing with them you better cancel it and get a towing card like AAA because if you use it couple of times they will cancel you!
